content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 32-39)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5) - now properly connected
- Boiler (position -5.0, 2.5) - fueled with coal (41 units remaining)
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 6.5) - operational
- Connected pipe network (positions -8.5,-0.5 to -5.5,0.5)
- Small electric pole (position 0.5, 8.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Operation at position (19.5, 74.5)
(No changes from previous report)

### Steel Production Line at position (18.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest (position 18.5, 15.5) - currently empty
- Stone furnace (position 21.0, 15.0) - fueled but no ingredients
- Output wooden chest (position 24.5, 15.5) - empty
- Inserter (position 19.5, 15.5) - not powered
- Not connected to power network

### Iron Smelting Column at position (12.0, 15.0)
(No changes from previous report)

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent placement distance errors
- Move within 10 tiles before placing entities (steps 32,35,37,38)
- Implement position verification before placement attempts
- Consider creating movement helper functions for construction areas

### Production line setup issues
- Connect inserters to power network (step 39)
- Supply input materials before testing production (steps 36,37)
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions are accessible (step 33)
- Use inserters between chests and belts (step 39)

### Placement collision problems
- Check for water/obstructions before furnace placement (steps 34,36,38)
- Clear existing entities completely before new constructions
- Verify terrain suitability for each placement

### Power network deficiencies
- Ensure proper power coverage for new production lines
- Connect all production components to power network
- Monitor power pole spacing requirements

### Production monitoring
- Verify input materials are present in chests
- Check fuel levels in all furnaces
- Monitor inserter operation status

## NAMESPACE

### Important Variables
- steel_furnace: Entity - Reference to primary steel production furnace
- power_pole: Position - Reference to power infrastructure location
- iron_furnaces: List[Entity] - References to iron smelting furnaces
- output_chests: List[Entity] - References to production output storage
- belt_network: List[Entity] - References to transport belt system
- new_furnace_pos: Position - Planned location for additional furnace
